description: Highest minimal distance of self-dual code of length 2n.
references: J. H. Conway and N. J. A. Sloane, A new upper bound on the minimal distance of self-dual codes, IEEE Trans. Inform. Theory, 36 (1990), 1319-1334.
J. H. Conway and N. J. A. Sloane, "Sphere Packings, Lattices and Groups", Springer-Verlag, p. xxiv.
N. J. A. Sloane and Simon Plouffe, The Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences, Academic Press, 1995 (includes this sequence).
author: _N. J. A. Sloane_.
